summary: The events of the Iranian Hostage Crisis and Canada's involvement, especially concerning Ambassador Ken Taylor, are explored.
cast: Assadollah Alam|Bob Anders|Jimmy Carter|Joe Clark|Walter Cronkite|William Daugherty|Massoumeh Ebtekar|Sadegh Ghotbzadeh|Carole Jerome|Sadegh Khalkhali|Ayatollah Khomeini|Flora MacDonald|Tony Mendez|Richard Nixon|Farah Pahlavi|Mohammad Reza Pahlavi|Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani|Anwar Sadat|Joe Schlesinger|Zena Sheardown|Gary Sick|Mohamad Tavakoli-Targhi|Ken Taylor
title: Our Man in Tehran
